name: Contact Entity III
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Horror Adventures © 2016, Paizo Inc.
target: up to 20 entities of 18 HD or fewer
text: This spell functions like contact entity II, except that you can contact creatures from the contact entity III list, and as noted above. Additionally, if a contacted creature has telepathy, it can send a telepathic message to you of up to 10 words.
text_zh: 此法术如同联系怪诞存在 I(contact entity II)般作用，除了你可以接触联系怪诞存在 III列表中的生物，如上图所述。武外，如果被接触的生物有心灵感应(telepathy)，它可以传递至多10个字的心灵讯息给你。
